TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_door", "quantity": 31, "index": 18}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 53, "index": 21}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "hopper_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft pink_carpet, I need to place a white_carpet in the crafting table and place a pink_dye next to it. I will start by moving the white_carpet from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1
